channel.title: Quick question
channel.description: all right, now i could search through the tutorial section for this, i know that, but tbh it'd be better if someone could give me a straight answer over here ... so the question is: how do i make it so that when a player clicks a object he receives a item in his inventory? <3 thanks in advance...

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

Tell me if you need more info

c.getItems().addItem(itemid,amount);

Read full topic
